topics.body:
I've also had dreams where I was able to self-terminate them, because I though they were getting too boring, stupid, or random for me to handle.

But one fun example was this one dream where I ended up making myself fall to my death, because I was about to be saved by some kid in high school who was a grade below me, and EHAN and I hated him and his less-annoying partner-in-crime. (EHAN was sadly in the same grade as him)

I was falling down some random labyrinth-thing, and I was about to fall into the abyss, when I was saved by somebody. As he was pulling me up, it turned out to be that kid. I was mortified, and went "nope screw this I'm done", and made myself fall to my death in the dream, waking up from it.

God I hated that kid. Thank god he left the next year, and his partner-in-crime barely did anything else to me and EHAN until we both moved back to Arizona in time for me to start college and him his senior year.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
I rarely have dreams, but when i do have them they tend to be kind of ominous.

Like once i had a a very vivid dream about my hometown being bombed by russians.

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3f23a63687233649e0100#post_54e3f23a63687233649e0100
[spoiler]That is the face of sadness, abuse, regret, and despair.

_This_ is the face of a genuinely ruthless and sadistic bully, and possibly a major crime-boss in-the-making, considering the things she loves to do and gets away with all the dang time:
!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120402132053/mlp/images/5/55/Diamond_Tiara_ordering_the_CMC_2_S2E23.png!
~-Huh. Diamond Tiara grows up to become the equivalent of the Godfather...
That's an interesting headcanon.-~[/spoiler]
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3f4246368726d2f030b00#post_54e3f4246368726d2f030b00
He was a lazy student, a punk, and did nothing but annoy me and EHAN for kicks. Even his own voice became notorious amongst me and EHAN, _especially the way he used to greet us..._

And then there were the assholes I had to deal with in my own grade, but those guys were a whole new level of pain-in-the-ass.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3f51063687256475f0000#post_54e3f51063687256475f0000
How did he greet you guys anyway?

"What's up, chumps?"

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e3f5d96368726c9a1f2200#post_54e3f5d96368726c9a1f2200
He just said our names in Spanish, with a smug kinda voice, you can probably imagine it

It's the way he says it that makes you wanna throw him out a window

Much like that little incident we had with that Packers fangirl earlier this year.
-Feels like a long time ago when that happened.-
